text: His Clancyness is a Canadian Italian band based in Bologna, Italy formed in 2009 by Jonathan Clancy. Currently the band consists of Jonathan Clancy on guitar and vocals, Jacopo Borazzo on drums, Giulia Mazza on organ and synthesizers and Nico Pasquini on bass and sampler. His Clancyness is signed to Brighton-based independent label FatCat Records.http://pitchfork.com/reviews/tracks/15355-his-clancyness-machines/ == Biography == His Clancyness' music has been described as 70s New York art-punk and late-80s US indie mixing elements of krautrock and psychedelic songwriting.https://www.theguardian.com/music/2013/oct/24/his-clancyness Tha band initially released two EP's in tape form, Hissometer Cassette and Always Mist. The latter garnered praise and buzz from online publications such as Pitchfork,http://pitchfork.com/forkcast/14209-summer-majestic/ Stereogumhttp://www.stereogum.com/1420212/his-clancyness-zenith-diamond- stereogum-premiere/mp3s/ and Gorilla vs. Bear.http://www.gorillavsbear.net/2010/01/02/ive-got-ocean-for-you/ ==Discography== * Hissometer (2009) * Aways Mist (2010) * Always Mist Revisited (2012) * Vicious (FatCat) (2013)http://www.allmusic.com/album/vicious-mw0002565118 * Isolation Culture (Maple Death Records) (2016) ==References== Category:2009 establishments in Canada Category:Italian indie rock groups Category:Noise pop musical groups
title: His Clancyness
